Number two is transgender people exist. That is just a fact. Gender  dysphoria is a medical fact. No serious medical person disagrees on  that point. It is not even debatable. There are a couple of things that  are debatable.

What do we do about it? What treatments are appropriate, given the  set of circumstances? Personally, I think it is wide…
